author: COMSOL
description:
A common class of fluid flow problems consists of pipe segments connected larger volumes like tanks and or boxes.

Here, a problem is set up with the Pipe Flow Module to model the flow in the microchannels of a heat exchanger. The example showcases the Pipe Connection feature that automatically connects a 3D volume and Pipe Flow sections.
label: heat_exchanger_plate.mph
name: root
